00031 void Database::Open(string file, int flags)
00032 {
00033         int ret = sqlite3_open_v2(file.c_str(),&_db,SQLITE_OPEN_READWRITE | SQLITE_OPEN_CREATE,NULL);
00034     if(ret != SQLITE_OK)
00035         throw std::runtime_error("cannot open database " + file);

00044 void Database::Exec(string sql)
00045 {
00046     char *error;
00047     int ret = sqlite3_exec(_db, sql.c_str(), NULL, NULL,  &error);
00048     if(ret != SQLITE_OK)
00049         throw std::runtime_error(string("cannot create frame table:\n") + error);
00050 }

00052 Statement *Database::Prepare(string sql)
00053 {
00054     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00055     int ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(_db,
00056             sql.c_str(), -1, &stmt, NULL);
00057     if(ret != SQLITE_OK)
00058         throw std::runtime_error("prepare insert frame statement failed");
00059     return new Statement(stmt);
00060 }
